name: Amalgamation (TheLittleTrooper)
description:
Two is better than one! Merge your allies together and grow stronger than ever before in this unique take on turn-based-tactics. You'll need teamwork to survive the onslaught from formidable foes.

How To Play: Click on your units to move to an available, highlighted square. When in range of an enemy, click on them to deal damage!

You can merge allies together by clicking on a unit and then another unit within range. Choose wisely, however, for you will gain all the "gifts" and "curses" of your ally.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.
